column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I had absolutely no idea about history and development of art forms over the years
column2: but the way each exhibit is explained will help you learn on the way. Make sure to spend some time in reading them. You can complete the museum in one day
column3: only if you plan to run through
column5: that would be a sore waste of your entry fee. I'd suggest to do one section at a time
column6: and you'll walk out of that place a bit more informed.
